/usr/bin/c++      CMakeFiles/boost_fun.dir/main.cpp.o  -o boost_fun /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_chrono.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_system.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_date_time.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_atomic.so -lpthread
